problem.markdown:
>>Debbie runs 0.6 of a mile every day. How many miles will Debbie run in 45 days?<< = 27
[explanation] .6 times 45 days = 27
problem.p: Debbie runs 0.6 of a mile every day. How many miles will Debbie run in 45 days?

formulaequationinput.label: Debbie runs 0.6 of a mile every day. How many miles will Debbie run in 45 days?
